name: Man VS. Monster
description:
This is a new game similar to Tower Defense. Earn more coin and make skill improvement is very important!
Heroes must be in a limited time, kill all monsters to get clearance. Each time a hero kills a monster will receive the corresponding gold. Players can use gold coins to enhance the hero's various skills, including the value of life, attack power, lightning kill, power improve skills.Attack and Lightning Killing is an important skill to kill monsters. Lightning kills have white lightning, blue lightning and golden lightning. White lightning has the weakest attack power and Golden lightning has the strongest attack power. Players must allocate gold rationally to improve Lightning Killing skills. Players must kill every monster on every wave. If there is a monster running to the bottom of the screen, it will trigger the thorns ball and shoot the herd of thorns bullets.
Cleverly controlling heroes, killing monsters, earning more gold coins, and sensibly elevating heroic skills are key strategies in this game.
There are four heroes in this game, Mark Ⅰ, Mark Ⅱ, Henry Ⅰ, Henry Ⅱ. Mark Ⅰ is a normal hero and it's free. Mark Ⅱ, Henry Ⅰ and Henry Ⅱ need to buy with gold. Their attributes improved by 5%, 10% and 20%.
